articles.title: Watch the Supra boost for Toyota's GR sporty coupe - Daily Record
articles.description: The clever engineers at Toyota have given the marque's GR Supra a bit of added appeal to motoring enthusiasts – by providing the option of going for a smaller engine. Now there's a twist. You can watch a video gallery of it here.
articles.content:
TOYOTA is expanding its GR Supra performance coupe line-up with the introduction of a 2.0-litre model.
 Priced from £45,995, it is almost £10,000 less than the 3.0-litre version introduced in 2019. … [+1536 chars]
